articles.description: The winners of Wednesday's Europa League final between Manchester United and Tottenham will be the lowest league finishers ever to win a major European trophy. BBC Sport examines their seasons, motives and stats.
articles.title: Europa League final: Manchester United and Tottenham meet in out-of-form final

articles.description: As Bruno Fernandes leads Man Utd out against Tottenham in the Europa League final, BBC Sport look at his journey - including almost signing for Spurs.
articles.title: Europa League final: How Bruno Fernandes became Manchester United's heart

articles.description: The city of Bilbao has a population of 345,000 but as many as 80,000 Manchester United and Tottenham fans are expected for the Europa League final.
articles.title: Europa League final: How Bilbao is coping with up to 80,000 Man Utd & Tottenham fans

articles.description: Want to follow along with the Europa League final but not sure who to support? Take our quiz to find your match!
articles.title: Quiz: Should you support Manchester United or Tottenham Hotspur in Europa League final?

articles.description: How will Europa League final rivals Ange Postecoglou and Ruben Amorim be preparing for the final?
articles.title: Europa League final: Spurs v Man Utd - How do you prepare for a final of this magnitude??

articles.description: England face West Indies in the first women's T20 in Canterbury - follow live scores, commentary, video highlights and updates.
articles.title: England vs West Indies LIVE: First women's T20, Canterbury - cricket score, commentary, highlights & updates

articles.description: Richard Carapaz launches a late attack to take victory on stage 11 of the Giro d'Italia on Wednesday, as overall leader Isaac del Toro finishes second.
articles.title: Giro d'Italia 2025: Richard Carapaz wins stage 11 as Isaac del Tor retains pink jersey

articles.description: BBC Sport's AMA team take a look at whether Monaco has lost its charm and place in the jam-packed season.
articles.title: Monaco Grand Prix: Has F1's iconic race become boring?

articles.description: Manchester City midfielder Phil Foden says he has "struggled" this season because of off-field issues and an ankle injury suffered against Manchester United.
articles.title: Phil Foden: Man City midfielder say struggles down to off-field issues and injury

articles.description: Captain Ben Stokes gives a strong hint that Jacob Bethell will come straight back into the England team for the series against India later this summer.
articles.title: Jacob Bethell: Ben Stokes hint puts pressure on Ollie Pope and Zak Crawley
